explanation: Agent A is correct. The macro _MHD_EXTERN expands to __attribute__((visibility("default"))) extern which uses GCC/Clang __attribute__ syntax — a documented compiler-specific language extension (not part of ISO C). MISRA C 2023 Rule 1.2 forbids use of language extensions unless they are specifically accepted/deviated; therefore the code as given violates Rule 1.2. (To avoid the violation, the attribute should be guarded by compiler-specific preprocessor checks or removed/abstracted so that only standard C is used in the MISRA-constrained build.)
